title: Google\Cloud\SecurityCenter\V1\KernelRootkit
name: KernelRootkit
description:
Kernel mode rootkit signatures.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.securitycenter.v1.KernelRootkit

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.unexpected_code_modification
params.description: True if unexpected modifications of kernel code memory are present.

params.name: data.unexpected_read_only_data_modification
params.description: True if unexpected modifications of kernel read-only data memory are present.

params.name: data.unexpected_ftrace_handler
params.description: True if ftrace points are present with callbacks pointing to regions that are not in the expected kernel or module code range.

params.name: data.unexpected_kprobe_handler
params.description: True if kprobe points are present with callbacks pointing to regions that are not in the expected kernel or module code range.

params.name: data.unexpected_kernel_code_pages
params.description: True if kernel code pages that are not in the expected kernel or module code regions are present.

params.name: data.unexpected_system_call_handler
params.description: True if system call handlers that are are not in the expected kernel or module code regions are present.

params.name: data.unexpected_interrupt_handler
params.description: True if interrupt handlers that are are not in the expected kernel or module code regions are present.

params.name: data.unexpected_processes_in_runqueue
params.description: True if unexpected processes in the scheduler run queue are present. Such processes are in the run queue, but not in the process task list.
